reviews.review: Still another great episode. Wether i find it better then episode 1 is another thing. Great episode with some great moments in it. The characters is still good.  Still like that your playing most of this episode with a companion. The last real fight can be a bit hectic, but thats just another thing. I get why people want an episode 3 tough ,but yeah well i enjoyed this game too. The variety in level is great . And the game or episode feels just hard enogh too. if you want a good fps well this episode or the whole half life 2 is recommneded.

I mean it's a half life episode. Its quality

Great gameplay its a shooter par excellence with the variation in enemies and the selection of weaponry and the physics engine is still a marvel to behold in 2019 and outclasses many other shooters. The simplicity of the graphics yet beauty of the graphics makes this game almost a work of art. You can play the game at a fast pace or take your time. 
The game runs on older systems with low end specs well. There were puzzles in the game that I thought were genius.  I am deeply impressed at how the devs managed throughout the whole series to utilise the possibilities of the engine to create a world that is fascinating, full of charming characters with moments that elicit a range of responses, sometimes I found myself charmed or shocked/horrified at some of the events that transpire in the story.
Outside the story the player is forced to adapt to changing environments and situations which makes for gameplay that is never stale, and you never quite know what to expect. Half life is a game that makes you think, and feel and it is worth playing through, and I would play through it again in time. It is not as good as hl2 because of the duration but it is better than hl2 episode 1 in that regard. I give the game a  9/10 as I was very happy with the solid game play mechanics and the ending.

The latest and last game of the Half-Life franchise (until Half Life Alyx) is naturally the most polished of the HL2 trilogy. The game makes the most out of the best parts of Half-Life 2 (physics, combat, world-building) in a shorter amount of time (the game takes about 6 hours to beat). Unfortunately for the past 12 years, we've been left with a heartbreaking cliffhanger that has yet to be expounded upon by the VR prequel coming out in several months. You can only yearn for a follow-up after you've finished the trilogy with this game. 

10/10

Самый последний эпизод который вышел через год после выхода Episode One.
Визуально игру очень неплохо подтянули,особенно это видно на открытых локациях.
А вот в геймплее в этот раз было побольше новшеств, это и давка личинок муравьиных львов,и поиск тайников по радару,и уничтожение страйдера с помощью бомбы и грави пушки 
Сюжет в это игре плавно продолжает историю законченную  на первом эпизоде,Аликс всё также нас сопровождает а мы все больше привязываемся к ней.Но именно этот эпизод оставил за собой жирнющий клиффхэнгер,и тогда и начались все те шуточки про Half-Life 2: Episode Three.
Но прошло много времени и именно в конце 2019 года Valve показала нам Half-Life: Alyx,надежда на возвращение серии теперь снова появилась в сердцах фанатов,лично я жду эту игру (хоть она и для вр)
